20030002.Original_Text: 혹시 저희 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>희망이</> 보셨나요?\n우리 집 개가 혼자 외출하고 안 돌아왔어요.
20030002.English_Text:
Have you seen our <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hope</>?
My dog went out alone and didn't come back.
20030002.Chinese_Text:
你见过<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>希望</>吗?
我的狗一个人出去了,没有回来.

20030004.Original_Text: 강아지 아니에요. 개에요. 개. 다 컸어요.\n집도 알고 말도 다 알아들어요.
20030004.English_Text:
It's not a dog. It's a dog. A dog. It's all grown.
I know the house and understand everything.
20030004.Chinese_Text:
它不是一只小狗.这是一只狗狗.我都长大了.
我了解房子,了解一切.

20030005.Original_Text: 얼굴도 다 알아보고 똑똑해요.\n손! 이러면 손도 내밀고. 앉아 일어서도 잘하고요.
20030005.English_Text:
It recognizes all faces and is smart.
Hands! If you do this, you reach out your hands. You can sit and stand up well.
20030005.Chinese_Text:
他能认出所有的面孔,而且很聪明. 
 手！如果是这样,伸出你的手.我可以很好地坐着和站起来.

20030007.Original_Text: 근데 집에 안 들어왔어요. 몰라서 못 오는 건 아닐 거예요.\n영리해서 백 리밖에서도 집을 찾을 수 있을 거예요.
20030007.English_Text:
But he didn't come home. It's not that he couldn't come because he didn't know.
You're smart and you'll be able to find a house a hundred miles away.
20030007.Chinese_Text:
但是他没有回家.不是我不知道就不能来.
我很聪明,一百里外都能找到房子.

20030008.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>희망이</>를 찾아 주세요. 어제부터 밥도 못 먹었을 텐데...
20030008.English_Text: Please find <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hope</>. You probably haven't eaten since yesterday...
20030008.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>请找到希望</>.我可能从昨天开始就没有吃东西了......

20030009.Original_Text: 근처에 가면 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>방울</> 소리가 들릴 거에요.\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>방울</>에 이름이 쓰여 있으니까 금방 알 수 있을 거예요.
20030009.English_Text:
You will hear <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Blob</> sound when you get nearby.
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Blob</> Your name is written on it, so you'll know it right away.
20030009.Chinese_Text:
走近会听到<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>铃</>的声音,
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>铃</>上面写着名字,马上就知道了.

20030010.English_Text: (I will let you know if I find it)
20030010.Chinese_Text: （如果我找到了我会告诉你的）

20030012.Original_Text: 개? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>희망이</> 알지. 아주 착하고 점잖은 개야.\n그리고 아주 몸집이 크지.
20030012.English_Text:
Dog? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>hope</> you know. A very nice and decent dog.
And very big.
20030012.Chinese_Text:
狗? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]> 希望 </> 你知道.它是一只非常善良和温柔的狗.
而且它非常大.

20030014.Chinese_Text: 为什么?这是怎么回事? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>希望</>消失了?

20030015.Original_Text: 뭐 안타까운 일이긴 하지만... \n개 한 마리 사라지는 게 뭐 대수로운 일이라고.
20030015.English_Text:
It's unfortunate, but... 
It's no big deal to lose a dog.
20030015.Chinese_Text:
很不幸,但是…… 
失去一只狗没什么大不了的.

20030016.English_Text: I'd be dead if I had been out here.
20030016.Chinese_Text: 如果我在外面,我早就死了.

20030017.English_Text: (I'm guessing they're just looking for it)

20030020.English_Text: Yes, what are you up to?

20030022.Original_Text: 그렇군요. 제가 그 부분까지는 파악하지 못해서...\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>희망이</> 관련해서 답변드리긴 어려운데요.
20030022.English_Text:
Okay. Since I didn't understand that part...
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hope</> It's hard to give you an answer.
20030022.Chinese_Text:
我知道了.我看不懂那部分……关于
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>希望</>很难给出答案.

20030023.Original_Text: 개는 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>만다라화</>가 내는 소리에 사람보다 민감하게 반응합니다.\n개는 사람이 듣지 못하는 부분까지 들으니까요.
20030023.English_Text:
Dogs are more sensitive to the sound of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>mandala</> than humans.
Dogs can hear parts that humans cannot.
20030023.Chinese_Text:
狗对<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>曼陀罗</>的声音的反应比人类更敏感 
狗能听到人类听不见的部分.

20030024.English_Text: If <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>dog</> came here, it might have collided with <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>mandala</> .
20030024.Chinese_Text: 如果<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>dog</>来到这里,它可能会与<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>曼陀罗</>相撞.

20030025.English_Text:
(He said he'd like to know and will look around
)
20030025.Chinese_Text:
（他说他会知道并说他会四处看看
）

20030027.English_Text:
I don't know about <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>this dog</>...
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Owner</> If so, would you know?
20030027.Chinese_Text:
我对<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>这只狗</>不太了解,但如果是
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>主人</>,我会找出来的,对吧?

20030029.English_Text: Then I will deliver the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Blob</> to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Master</>.

20030031.Original_Text: 그 부분에 관해서 설명을 잘해야겠네요.\n쉽진 않겠지만 말이죠.
20030031.English_Text:
I should be able to explain that part well.
It won't be easy.
20030031.Chinese_Text:
我应该可以很好地解释那部分.
这并不容易.

20030033.Original_Text: (뭔가 혼이 빠진 듯한 얼굴을 하고 있다)
20030033.English_Text: (makes a face that looks like something is missing)
20030033.Chinese_Text: （她做着一张似乎失去灵魂的脸）

20030034.Original_Text: 예? 혹시 저한테 무슨 말씀 하셨습니까?\n제가 못들었는데 다시 한번 말씀해 주시겠어요?
20030034.English_Text:
Yes? What did you say to me by any chance?
I didn't hear it, could you tell me again?
20030034.Chinese_Text:
是的?你有没有对我说过什么?
我没听到,你能再说一遍吗?

20030035.Original_Text: (아직 걸지 않았다고 한다.\n복잡한 얼굴이라며 괜찮은지 묻는다)
20030035.English_Text:
(He said he hasn't hung up yet.
He asks if he's okay because he has a complicated face)
20030035.Chinese_Text:
（他说还没挂.
他说是复杂的脸,问他没事吧）

20030036.Original_Text: 아... 제가 속마음을 잘 감추진 못하나 봅니다.\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>동부 생태 조사림</> 쪽에 나가 있는 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>동료</>가 걱정돼서요.
20030036.English_Text:
Ah... I guess I can't hide my feelings well.
The on the page <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Eastern Ecological Forestry</> <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>I'm worried about my colleague</>.
20030036.Chinese_Text:
啊……我想我也无法很好地掩饰自己的心情.我担心我的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>同事</>在
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>东部生态森林</>.

20030037.English_Text: Since I was a child, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>friend</>, so I went to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sea Moon Continent</> together.. .
20030037.Chinese_Text: 从小就去<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>海月大陆</>因为我是朋友</>...

20030039.English_Text: These days, there are rumors that <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Nokseodaegwi</> has started their activities.
20030039.Chinese_Text: 最近,有传言<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Nokryeokdaegwi</> 已经开始活动了.

20030041.Original_Text: 저도 실제로 본 적은 없습니다만, 엄청난 괴물이라고 합니다.\n혹시 괜찮으시면 제 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>동료</>를 도와주시겠습니까?
20030041.English_Text:
I've never actually seen it, but it's said to be a huge monster.
If it's okay, would you mind helping my <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Colleague</>?
20030041.Chinese_Text:
虽然没见过,但据说是巨大的怪物.
你介意帮助我的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>同事</>吗?

20030042.English_Text: Oh, how did you get here?

20030044.Original_Text: 아... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>황태</> 녀석이 그런 이야기를...\n요즘 인근에 나타나는 괴물의 수가 감당할 수 없게 늘어났습니다.
20030044.English_Text:
Ah... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Emperor</> He told such a story...
The number of monsters appearing nearby these days has grown uncontrollably.
20030044.Chinese_Text:
啊…… <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>皇帝</>他讲了这样一个故事…… 
近来出现在附近的怪物数量已经超出了我们的控制范围.

20030045.Original_Text: 일반인들의 출입을 막는 것은 물론... \n저희도 순찰을 못 하고 있어요.
20030045.English_Text:
Not to mention blocking the entry of the public... 
We can't patrol either.
20030045.Chinese_Text:
更别说阻止一般人进入了…… 
我们也不能巡逻.

20030046.Original_Text: 잘못 포위당하면 어떻게 될지 알 수 없거든요.\n혹시 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹력대귀</>라도 나오면...
20030046.English_Text:
You don't know what will happen if you are surrounded by mistake.
If you come up with <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Green Rabbit</>...
20030046.Chinese_Text: 我不知道如果我被错误包围会发生什么.

20030047.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ask what kind of monster this green giant ogre</> is)
20030047.Chinese_Text: （请问 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]> 绿琉大圭 </> 是什么怪物）

20030048.Original_Text: 사실 본 적은 없습니다만 엄청난 괴물입니다.
20030048.English_Text: I've never actually seen it, but it's a huge monster.
20030048.Chinese_Text: 我从未真正见过它,但它是一个巨大的怪物.

20030049.Original_Text: 대원 중에서도 이미 희생자가 나왔습니다.\n현재 정확한 위치를 찾지 못했습니다.
20030049.English_Text:
There have already been victims among the crew.
The exact location could not be found at this time.
20030049.Chinese_Text:
船员中已经有遇难者 
目前还没有找到确切的位置.

20030050.English_Text: (He said he would patrol the inside and report the situation)
20030050.Chinese_Text: （他说他会在里面巡逻,让你知道情况）

20030051.Original_Text: 물론 능력엔 자신 있으시겠지만... <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹력대귀</>는 부디 조심하세요.\n저희가 대략적인 위치는 말씀드릴게요.
20030051.English_Text:
Of course you're confident in your abilities... but please be careful with <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Red Swallow</>.
We'll give you an approximate location.
20030051.Chinese_Text:
当然,你对自己的能力有信心,但请注意<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>绿贤者</>. 
我会告诉你我们的大概位置.

20030052.English_Text: (Is this where the crew was talking?)

20030053.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Red cypress</> appears?
I don't think it's here...)
20030053.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>绿力大圭</>出现?
这里好像不存在……）

20030054.Original_Text: (다른 곳으로 가버렸거나\n잘못된 소문이 퍼진 것 같다)
20030054.English_Text:
(It looks like it's gone somewhere else
or some false rumors have spread)
20030054.Chinese_Text:
（好像你去了别的地方
或谣言散播了）

20030057.Original_Text: 역시 괴물의 수가 너무 많군요.\n상부에 보고해야겠어요.
20030057.English_Text:
There are too many monsters as well.
I have to report it to my superiors.
20030057.Chinese_Text:
毕竟怪物太多了.
我得向上级汇报.

20030058.Original_Text: 당분간은 순찰도 멈추는 게 나을지 모르겠네요.
20030058.English_Text: Maybe it would be better to stop patrolling for the time being.
20030058.Chinese_Text: 不知道是不是暂时停止巡逻比较好.

20030060.Original_Text: 안쪽에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹력대귀</>는 없군요. \n그럼 현재 어디있는지 알 수 없는 상황이네요.
20030060.English_Text:
There's no <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Green Loggerhead</> inside. 
Then you don't know where it is now.
20030060.Chinese_Text:
里面没有<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>锈大圭</>. 
然后我不知道我现在在哪里.

20030061.Original_Text: 차라리 한 장소에서 보이면\n다른 쪽은 마음이 편할텐데...
20030061.English_Text:
I'd rather see it in one place
and feel at ease in the other...
20030061.Chinese_Text:
如果我能在一个地方看到它,
另一个地方会更舒服......

20030065.English_Text: I am ruined. There is no hope.

20030066.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹각다귀</>가 곡식을 다 뜯어 먹는데...\n어떻게 할 도리가 없습니다.
20030066.English_Text:
The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>green antler</> is eating all the grain...
I don't know what to do.
20030066.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]> 绿乌鸦</> 把所有的谷物都吃光了…… 
 我不知道该怎么办.

20030068.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹각다귀</>야 원래 쭉 있었는데 최근 들어\n그 수가 미친 듯이 늘어나서...
20030068.English_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Angel gnats</>It used to be there, but recently
the number has increased like crazy...
20030068.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>红乌鸦</>嘿嘿,原来是有的,不过最近
数量暴增……

20030069.Original_Text: 이제 감당할 수 없는 상태입니다.\n전 그냥 포기할랍니다. 물이나 먹고 살아야죠.
20030069.English_Text:
I can't handle it now.
I'll just give up. I'll have to get some water to live.
20030069.Chinese_Text:
我现在买不起.
我要放弃了.我必须吃水和生活.

20030070.Original_Text: (뭔가 전문가들에게 방법을 물어보면 좋을 것 같은데...)
20030070.English_Text: (I think it would be nice to ask some experts how...)
20030070.Chinese_Text: （我觉得还是问问高手怎么做比较好……）

20030072.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹각다귀</>가 갑자기 늘어난 문제는 안 그래도 확인하고 있었습니다.
20030072.English_Text: We were still checking the problem of the sudden increase in <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Antwerp</>.
20030072.Chinese_Text: 我还在检查<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>鹿角</>数量突然增加的问题.

20030073.English_Text: I haven't found a good answer yet...
20030073.Chinese_Text: 我还没有找到好的答案......

20030074.Original_Text: 지금 결단을 내려야 한다면 우선 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹각다귀</>를 제거해야겠지요.
20030074.English_Text: If I had to make a decision now, I would first get rid of the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Antler</>.
20030074.Chinese_Text: 如果我现在就做决定,我就得先把<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>鹿角</>去掉.

20030075.Original_Text: 그래서 고기를 얻어서 식량으로 쓰거나,\n고기 이외의 부산물은 비료로 가공하는 식으로요.
20030075.English_Text:
So you get meat and use it as food,
process byproducts other than meat as fertilizer, etc.
20030075.Chinese_Text:
所以,你把肉拿来当食物,或者
把肉以外的副产品加工成肥料.

20030078.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹각다귀</>의 활동 반경이 넓어진 것 관련해선 저희도 대응 중입니다만...
20030078.English_Text: We are also responding to the increased radius of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Antler</>'s activity...
20030078.Chinese_Text: 我们也在回应<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>红鹿角</>的活动半径扩大了,但是……

20030079.Original_Text: 저희 예상을 훨씬 넘고 있어서 어려움을 겪고 있습니다.
20030079.English_Text: We are having a hard time exceeding our expectations.

20030080.English_Text: I plan to somehow get rid of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Antwerp</> to reclaim the farmland.
20030080.Chinese_Text: 不知怎么的,我们打算去掉<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>鹿角</>开垦农田.

20030081.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹력대귀</>가 나타난 것과 \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹각다귀</>가 급증한 일이 연관이 있어 보입니다만...
20030081.English_Text:
The appearance of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Red locust</> and the surge in 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Red locust</> It seems related, but...
20030081.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]> Noknosperm </>的出现和
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]> Nokroki </>的快速增加似乎有联系,但是……

20030082.English_Text: There is no exact evidence yet.
20030082.Chinese_Text: 目前还没有确切的证据.

20030083.English_Text:
But! We're going to somehow defeat <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Antler</>
and reclaim the farmland.
20030083.Chinese_Text:
然而！我们计划以某种方式击败<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>鹿角</>并收回
农田.

20030085.Chinese_Text:
（未知的事情
我感到危险）

20030086.Chinese_Text:
（
里面的气氛似乎很不寻常）

20030087.English_Text: (Isn't there a monster called <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Green Giant</> here?)
20030087.Chinese_Text:
（
中不是有一个叫<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>绿琉大圭</>的怪物吗?）

20030088.English_Text:
(Don't go inside
If you don't have a business right now)
20030088.Chinese_Text:
（如果你现在没有生意,不要进去
）

20030090.Original_Text: 말씀은 감사합니다만...\n제가 할 수 있는 건 아무것도 없는 거군요.
20030090.English_Text:
Thank you for your words...
There is nothing I can do.
20030090.Chinese_Text:
谢谢你的话... 
我无能为力.

20030092.English_Text:
But you still know <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Foster</>
Somehow You will.
20030092.Chinese_Text:
不过,既然你知道<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>沙湖</>和<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>修阳</>,
我就做点什么吧.

20030093.Original_Text: (그러고 보니 숲 안쪽에\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>분위기가 특이한 장소</>가 있었다고 한다)
20030093.English_Text:
(It turns out that there was a place with a strange atmosphere</> in the forest
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]></>)
20030093.Chinese_Text:
（顺便说一句,据说在森林里有一个具有独特氛围
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>的地方</>）

20030094.Original_Text: 요즘 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹력대귀</>가 관측되지 않고 있다고 하던데...\n혹시 그곳에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹력대귀</>가 있는 거 아닐까요?
20030094.English_Text:
I heard that <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Red cyst</> is not being observed these days...
I wonder if there is <textColor=[215:94:94:255]> Maybe there's a green dragon daegwi</>?
20030094.Chinese_Text:
据说<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>绿力大耳</>这几天没有被观察到...
不知道有没有<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>绿力大耳</>也许有

20030095.English_Text: (I think it's better to be careful)

20030096.Original_Text: 과거 사람들이 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹력대귀</>에 해를 가했다는 이야기가 있던데...\n사람들에게 복수하는 걸까요?
20030096.English_Text:
There was a story that people in the past harmed <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Green Dragon</>...
Is it revenge on people?
20030096.Chinese_Text:
过去有人说人们伤害了<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>绿力大耳</>...
是报复人吗？

20030097.English_Text: Ugh, it's so scary, if <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</> or <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</> get rid of it soon. I wish.
20030097.Chinese_Text:
嗯嗯,好吓人,如果<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>戒律</>或者<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>萨霍</>把
去掉就好了.

20030098.Original_Text: 그건 그거고... 우선 전 제가 할 일을 해야겠네요.\n일단 이곳에서 농기구 관리나 하고 있겠습니다.
20030098.English_Text:
That's it... First of all, I have to do my job.
For now, I'll be managing farm equipment here.
20030098.Chinese_Text:
就是这样……首先,我要做好我的工作.
现在,我会在这里管理农具.

20030281.Original_Text: 근데 농기구 관리를 하려고 해도...\n가진 게 없으니 뭔가 살 수가 없군요.
20030281.English_Text:
But even if I try to manage farm equipment...
I don't have anything, so I can't buy anything.
20030281.Chinese_Text:
但即使我尝试管理农具... 
我没有任何东西,所以我买不到任何东西.

20030283.Original_Text: 그래도 제가 손기술은 좀 있으니...\n자재만 있으면 어떻게든 할 수 있을 것 같습니다.
20030283.English_Text:
Still, I have some craftsmanship...
I think I can do anything with the materials.
20030283.Chinese_Text:
但是,我有一些手工技能...... 
我认为我可以用材料做任何事情.

20030285.English_Text: I'm going over there <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>the beach</> to pick up <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>debris</>me.

20030287.Original_Text: 어차피 굶어 죽으나 맞아 죽으나 같은 거니까요.
20030287.English_Text: It's the same whether you die of starvation anyway.
20030287.Chinese_Text: 无论哪种方式,你死于饥饿,或者你死于饥饿,都是一样的.

20030288.English_Text: ('Request a raid on the Expedition Point. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>ImXX</>')

20030289.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>임씨 성을 가진 자</>가 요청했던 것 같다. \n이름 부분을 일부러 지웠는지 읽을 수가 없다)
20030289.English_Text:
(<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>The person with the surname Im</> requested this.
I can't read the name part because it was intentionally deleted)
20030289.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>好像是姓我</>的人要求的.
我故意看不懂姓名部分.）

20030290.Original_Text: (임? 일단 요청자는 넘어가고 다음 내용을 계속 읽어보자)
20030290.English_Text: (Im? Let's skip the requester and continue reading the next one)
20030290.Chinese_Text: （我?让我们跳过请求者并继续阅读下一个）

20030291.Original_Text: "(습격을 위해 도착했으나, 다음 연락이 없다.\n우린 습격을 포기하고 돌아가기로 했다)"
20030291.English_Text:
('We arrived for the raid, but there is no further contact.
We decided to give up the raid and return')
20030291.Chinese_Text:
（'我们是为了突袭而来,但没有进一步的联系.
我们决定放弃突袭并返回'）

20030292.Original_Text: "(지금 해류와 바람으론 돌아갈 수 없으니, \n사흘 동안 조용히 숨어 있다 돌아가도록 하자)"
20030292.English_Text:
('Current currents and winds can't go back,
Let's hide quietly for three days and then go back')
20030292.Chinese_Text: （‘现在风流回不去,悄悄躲了三天就回去了’）

20030293.English_Text: (Is there no intention to attack the base?)

20030294.Original_Text: 이 무거운 걸 다 가져오신 겁니까?
20030294.English_Text: Did you bring all this heavy stuff?
20030294.Chinese_Text: 这么重的东西你带了吗?

20030295.English_Text: (It is said that there were a lot of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>material</> around the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>wreck</>)

20030296.Original_Text: 이거라면 농기구를 만들 수 있을 것 같습니다.
20030296.English_Text: I think I could make farm implements from this.

20030298.Chinese_Text: （那里,据说<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>长岛</>……不,没什么特别的）

20030299.English_Text: I'm glad you didn't have anything special...
20030299.Chinese_Text: 幸运的是,该.我什么都没有...

20030301.Original_Text: 뭐 당장 농사를 시작할 수는 없지만...\n언제라도 시작할 수 있는 상태까진 만들어 두려고요.
20030301.English_Text:
Well, I can't start farming right now...
I'm trying to create a state where I can start at any time.
20030301.Chinese_Text:
嗯,我现在不能开始耕种…… 
我正在努力做到我可以随时开始的地步.

20030302.English_Text: I see some hope! Thank you.
20030302.Chinese_Text: 我看到了一些希望！谢谢你.

20030101.Original_Text: 저는 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>뱀버섯</>에 중독되어 죽는 사람들을 위해 약을 개발하고 있는데요.
20030101.English_Text: I'm developing a drug for people who die of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>snake mushroom</> poisoning.
20030101.Chinese_Text: 我正在为中毒死亡的人开发药物<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蛇蘑菇</>.

20030102.Original_Text: 이게 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>뱀버섯</>의 독을 이용해서 약을 만드는 거라서...\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>뱀버섯</>의 독을 구해야 하거든요.
20030102.English_Text:
This is because <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>snake mushroom</>'s poison is used to make medicine...
I need to get the poison from <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Snake Mushroom</>.
20030102.Chinese_Text:
这是因为<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蛇菇</>的毒是用来做药的……我需要从
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蛇菇</>那里得到毒药.

20030103.Original_Text: 물론 저도 소량 정도는 어떻게 해보겠는데요.\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>뱀버섯</>에 당하는 사람은 너무 많고...
20030103.English_Text:
Of course, I'll try with a small amount.
There are too many people suffering from <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Snake mushroom</>...

20030104.Original_Text: 약은 시간이 흐르면 약효가 사라지고...\n제가 할 수 있는 게 너무 제한적이네요.
20030104.English_Text:
A drug loses its effectiveness over time...
What I can do is too limited.
20030104.Chinese_Text:
药物会随着时间的流逝而失去效力…… 
 我能做的很有限.

20030105.English_Text: (They say you're doing a good job)

20030106.Original_Text: 그냥 자기만족 같은 거예요. \n사람들을 돕고 나면 좀 뿌듯하기도 하고...
20030106.English_Text:
It's just like self-satisfaction.
After helping people, I feel a little proud...
20030106.Chinese_Text:
这只是自我满足. 
 帮助过人后,有点自豪……

20030107.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>뱀버섯</>을 가져오면 약을 만들 수 있는지 묻는다)
20030107.English_Text: (If you bring <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Snake Mushroom</>, it asks if you can make medicine)
20030107.Chinese_Text: （如果你带<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蛇菇</>,它会问你是否可以做药）

20030108.Original_Text: 사실은 독만 채취하면 되는데... 그건 기술이 필요하니까요.\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>뱀버섯</>을 잡아 오시면 약을 만들 수 있죠.
20030108.English_Text:
Actually, all you need to do is collect the poison... that requires skill.
If you catch <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Snake Mushroom</>, you can make medicine.
20030108.Chinese_Text:
其实只要采集毒药……因为那是需要技巧的,抓到
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蛇菇</>就可以炼药了.

20030109.Original_Text: 오셨군요. 이 정도면 약 몇 개는 나오겠네요.\n이것들의 독을 추출하고...
20030109.English_Text:
You are here. This should be enough for a few.
Extract these poisons...
20030109.Chinese_Text:
你在这里.如果够了,大概会出来几个. 
 从这些中提取毒药,然后……

20030110.Original_Text: 남은 버섯은 여기서 전골 재료로 쓰거나, \n발효시키다가 주정을 넣고 버섯주를 만들면... 룰루루
20030110.English_Text: The leftover mushrooms can be used as a hot pot here, or if you ferment and add alcohol to make mushroom wine... Lulu
20030110.Chinese_Text:
剩下的蘑菇可以在这里做火锅,或者
发酵加酒精做成蘑菇酒……露露

20030111.Original_Text: 이게 아주 별미거든요. 없어서 못 팔아요!
20030111.English_Text: It's so delicious. I can't sell it because I don't have it!

20030112.Original_Text: 버섯주는 사람들이 막 미쳐요! \n독이 들어있는지 많이들 물어보는데...
20030112.English_Text:
People who give mushrooms are just crazy! 
A lot of people ask if it's poisonous...
20030112.Chinese_Text:
送蘑菇的人疯了！ 
 很多人问有没有毒...

20030113.Original_Text: 사실은 없어요. 근데! \n극소량 들었다고 하면 다들 좋아 죽어요.
20030113.English_Text:
It's not true. But! 
If you hear a very small amount, everyone will die.
20030113.Chinese_Text:
没有真相.然而！ 
如果你说你听到的很少,每个人都会喜欢它而死.

20030114.Original_Text: 독 있다는데 왜 좋아하는 거야?\n세상엔 이상한 사람들이 참 많아요. 그렇지 않아요?
20030114.English_Text:
It's poisonous, so why do you like it?
There are so many strange people in the world, aren't they?
20030114.Chinese_Text:
有毒,你为什么喜欢它们?
世界上有那么多奇怪的人.不是吗?

20030115.English_Text: (Ask if this is the purpose of the mushroom hotpot or mushroom wine)
20030115.Chinese_Text: （他们问目的是蘑菇火锅还是蘑菇酒）

20030116.Original_Text: 모르는 소리 마세요. 그것들로 수익을 안 내면\n약 하나에 순금으로 한 냥은 받아야 할 텐데...
20030116.English_Text:
Don't tell me you don't know. If you don't make a profit with them,
you'll have to get a penny of pure gold for each...
20030116.Chinese_Text: 别说你不知道.如果你不从他们那里获利,你就必须得到一粒纯金 nyang ......

20030117.Original_Text: 돈 없는 사람은 그냥 죽으란 소립니까? \n이게 다 버섯주를 비싼 값에 사가니까 가능한 거예요.
20030117.English_Text:
Are you saying people without money should just die?
This is all possible because you buy mushroom wine at a high price.
20030117.Chinese_Text:
你是说没钱的人就该死? 
 这一切都是可能的,因为你以高价购买了蘑菇酒.

20030118.Original_Text: 전골과 버섯주에 감사해야 마땅하죠.\n나중에 시간 되면 전골 한 냄비 하실래요?
20030118.English_Text:
You should be grateful for the hot pot and mushroom wine.
Would you like a pot of hot pot later when you have time?
20030118.Chinese_Text:
应该感谢火锅和蘑菇汤.
以后有空要来一锅火锅吗?

20030119.English_Text: Are there ghosts? Do you see anything in vain?
20030119.Chinese_Text: 精灵出来了?你看到什么都是徒劳的吗?

20030121.Original_Text: 저는 그런 게 잘 안 보이는데, \n친구가 이번에 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>위령묘지</>에 발령이 나서요.
20030121.English_Text:
I don't see that very well, but 
a friend has been assigned to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Soul Cemetery</> this time.
20030121.Chinese_Text:
我不太清楚,但是这次
朋友被派往<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>纪念墓地</>.

20030122.Original_Text: 거기 가더니만 갑자기 혼령을 봤다고...\n더 그곳에서 근무 못 하겠다고 그러는 거예요.
20030122.English_Text:
I went there, but suddenly I saw a ghost...
You said that you won't be able to work there any more.
20030122.Chinese_Text:
他去了那里,突然看到了一个鬼…… 
他说他不能再在那里工作了.

20030123.English_Text: (Ask if a real spirit came out)

20030124.Original_Text: 전 모르죠. \n그런 기운을 잘 못 느껴서요.
20030124.English_Text:
I don't know. 
I don't feel that kind of energy.
20030124.Chinese_Text:
我不知道. 
我感觉不到那种能量.

20030125.English_Text: If it's okay with you, I'd appreciate it if you check it once.
20030125.Chinese_Text:
如果你没问题,小合作
检查一下就谢天谢地了.

20030127.English_Text:
Ah! What a surprise! Aww!
You knew it was weird!
20030127.Chinese_Text:
哦！这是个惊喜！啊哈！
你知道这很奇怪！

20030129.English_Text: (He came to check if it was a real spirit)
20030129.Chinese_Text: （据说他是来看看是不是真的鬼）

20030130.Original_Text: 아. 제가 얼마 전 순찰 중에 느낌이 왔거든요.\n물론 제가 살짝 민감하긴 한데...
20030130.English_Text:
Ah. I got a feeling while on patrol a while ago.
Of course, I'm a little sensitive...
20030130.Chinese_Text:
啊.前段时间在巡逻的时候有这种感觉
当然有点敏感,但是……

20030131.Original_Text: 이제 와서 생각해보면 딱히 악의를 느꼈던 건 아니었어요.
20030131.English_Text: Now that I think about it, I didn't really feel bad.
20030131.Chinese_Text: 现在回想起来,我并没有因此而感到难过.

20030132.Chinese_Text: 但不是有些令人毛骨悚然吗?

20030133.Original_Text: 그리고 혹시 그때 이후로 저한테 악의를 품었을지도?
20030133.English_Text: And maybe you've been ill with me since then?
20030133.Chinese_Text: 也许从那时起你就对我感到不适?

20030134.Original_Text: 그냥 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>묘지</>관리는 관둘 겁니다. \n배치 안 바꿔주면 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</> 관두죠. 뭐.
20030134.English_Text:
I'll just quit <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>graveyard</>administration. 
If you don't reposition <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>weep</> Quit. What.
20030134.Chinese_Text:
我就不再管理<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>墓地</>了. 
 如果你不改变布局, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]> 培训 </> 你会退出.什么.

20030136.Original_Text: 여기 소속은 아니고요. 이 근처를 지나고 있었는데...
20030136.English_Text: I don't belong here. I was passing by this area...
20030136.Chinese_Text: 我不属于这里.我路过这里...

20030137.Original_Text: 저번에 다른 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</> 대원을 보게 되어 \n같이 비석을 정리하자고 말하려고 했는데
20030137.English_Text:
Last time I saw another <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</> crew, 
I was going to tell you to clean up the tombstone together
20030137.Chinese_Text:
前几天,我看到了其他的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>纪律和</>成员,所以我想说
我们一起清理墓碑吧.

20030138.Original_Text: 제 말은 들은 척도 안 하고 어디론가\n가버리더라고요.
20030138.English_Text:
They didn't even pretend to listen to me and
went away.
20030138.Chinese_Text:
他们甚至没有假装听我说的话就去了哪里
.

20030139.Original_Text: (그분은 혼령이 말을 걸었다고 생각한 것 같다고 답한다)
20030139.English_Text: (He replies that he thinks the spirit has spoken)
20030139.Chinese_Text: （他回答说他认为灵魂已经说话了）

20030140.Original_Text: 아. 그렇군요. 여긴 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>묘지</>니까 그렇게 생각할 수도 있겠네요.\n앞으로 조심해야겠네요...
20030140.English_Text:
Ah. That's right. This is a <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>cemetery</>, so you might think so.
I'll have to be more careful in the future...
20030140.Chinese_Text:
啊.我知道了.既然是<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>墓地</>,你可能会这么想.
以后要小心了……

20030141.Original_Text: 저쪽에 사악한 기운을 가진 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>영혼불</>들이 있던데...\n저런 것들때문에 악한 존재라고 오해를 사는 거 아닐까요?
20030141.English_Text:
There were <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Soulfire</> with evil energy...
Isn't that why they are misunderstood as evil beings?
20030141.Chinese_Text:
那边有<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>魂火</>带着邪气…… 
他们不会因为那些东西被误认为是邪灵吧?

20030143.Original_Text: 혹시 괜찮으시면 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>영혼불</> 퇴치를 요청해도 될까요?\n제가 지금 상태가 좋지 않아서 힘을 쓸 수가 없네요.
20030143.English_Text:
If it's okay with you, may I request to get rid of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Soulfire</>?
I'm not feeling well right now, so I can't use my power.
20030143.Chinese_Text:
如果你没问题,我可以要求移除<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>魂火</>吗? 
我现在不能使用我的力量,因为我感觉不舒服.

20030144.Original_Text: (그리고 피곤해 보이니 경치 좋은 곳에 가서\n좀 쉬는 게 좋겠다고 한다)
20030144.English_Text:
(And he said he'd rather go to a scenic place
and get some rest because he looks tired)
20030144.Chinese_Text:
（因为你看起来很累,他们说你应该去一个风景优美的地方
休息一会儿）

20030145.English_Text: How was it? Did something not come out?

20030146.English_Text: (He said he never met a ghost)
20030146.Chinese_Text: （据说他没有遇到特殊的精神）

20030147.Original_Text: 그러셨군요. 다행입니다.\n제가 착각한 걸 수도 있겠네요.
20030147.English_Text:
You did. I'm glad.
Maybe I'm mistaken.
20030147.Chinese_Text:
这是正确的.我很高兴.
我可能误会了.

20030148.English_Text:
(It is said that he cleared the tombstone while he was gone,
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Soul Fire</>)
20030148.Chinese_Text:
（据说墓碑没了就清理了,
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>魂火</>处理了）

20030149.Original_Text: 감사합니다. 제가 해야 했던 일인데...\n저번에 막 도망치느라 아무것도 못했네요.
20030149.English_Text:
Thank you. This is what I had to do...
I just ran away and didn't do anything.
20030149.Chinese_Text:
谢谢你.这是我不得不做的事情... 
我上次逃跑了,所以我什么也做不了.

20030150.English_Text: I'll reflect and do my best as a <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>cemetery</>guardian once again!
20030150.Chinese_Text:
再次作为
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>墓地</>守卫,好好反省吧！

20030153.English_Text: What are you keeping your distance for?

20030155.Original_Text: 딱히 오늘 특별한 일이 없으시다면\n같이 꽃이나 보러 가지 않으시겠습니까?
20030155.English_Text:
If you don't have anything special today
would you like to go see flowers together?
20030155.Chinese_Text: 如果今天没有什么特别的事,不如我们一起去看花吧?

20030156.English_Text: (I have nothing to say, so I am silent)

20030157.Original_Text: 제가 이상한 말이라도 했나요?\n꽃이 필요한데 도움이 필요해서요.
20030157.English_Text:
Did I say something strange?
I need flowers and I need help.
20030157.Chinese_Text:
我说了什么奇怪的话吗?
我需要鲜花,我需要帮助.

20030159.Original_Text: 저도 정확히는 모릅니다.\n과거 탐사대가 이곳을 개척하며 많은 이들이 죽었고...
20030159.English_Text:
I don't know exactly.
In the past expeditions pioneered this place, and many died...
20030159.Chinese_Text:
我不确定. 
 过去许多探险队开辟了这个地方,许多人死了……

20030160.Original_Text: 제대로 사람들을 묻고 추모할 여유가 없었어요.
20030160.English_Text: I couldn't afford to properly bury and honor people.
20030160.Chinese_Text: 我负担不起适当地埋葬和纪念人们.

20030161.Original_Text: 그래서 근처에서 그나마 땅의 상태가 안정적이었던\n이곳에 공동으로 매장했다고 들었습니다.
20030161.English_Text:
That's why I heard that they were jointly buried here where the condition of the land was stable
in the vicinity.
20030161.Chinese_Text:
所以,我听说他们共同埋葬在这里
土地条件稳定的地方.

20030163.Original_Text: 저희 아버지도 이곳 어딘가 계실 거예요.\n정확히 어딘지는 모르죠. 그래서...
20030163.English_Text:
My father must also be here somewhere.
I don't know exactly where. So...
20030163.Chinese_Text:
我父亲肯定也在这里.
我不知道具体在哪里.所以...

20030164.Original_Text: 여기 올 때마다 매번 다른 묘비 앞에다 꽃을 두고 갑니다.\n언젠가 한 번은 아버지께 꽃을 올릴 수 있을 것 같아서요.
20030164.English_Text:
Every time I come here, I leave flowers in front of a different tombstone.
I think I'll be able to give flowers to my father someday.
20030164.Chinese_Text:
每次来这里,都会在不同的墓碑前留花.
我想有一天我可以给父亲献花.

20030166.Original_Text: 꼭 아버지가 아니어도 선배님들께\n인사드린다는 의미도 있으니까요.
20030166.English_Text: Even if you're not a father, it also means saying hello to your seniors.
20030166.Chinese_Text: 即使你不是父亲,这也意味着问候你的前辈.

20030167.Original_Text: 여기 혼자 오면 갈 때 좀 우울하거든요.\n근데 오늘은 괜찮을 것 같습니다.
20030167.English_Text:
I get a little depressed when I go here alone.
But I think I'll be fine today.
20030167.Chinese_Text:
一个人来有点郁闷.
不过我想我今天会没事的.

20030168.English_Text: Thank you. Thank you for today.
20030168.Chinese_Text: 谢谢.今天真是谢谢你了.

20030169.English_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Bloodplate</> if only I knew the location of the base...
20030169.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>血盘</> 要是能知道基地的位置就好了……

20030170.Original_Text: 정확한 증거가 있어야 대병력을 움직일 수 있을 텐데...
20030170.English_Text: I would be able to move a large force only with accurate evidence...
20030170.Chinese_Text: 只有有准确的证据,我们才能移动大部队……

20030171.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Bloodplate</> asks what's going on at the base)

20030173.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>풍요 우림 거점</>과 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>안개 숲 개척지</>는\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</> 전체의 물품 보급을 위해서...
20030173.English_Text:
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Abundant Rainforest Node</> and <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Misty Forest Front</>
<textColor= [110:216:175:255]>Sea Moon Continent</> For supplying the entire continent...
20030173.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>丰富的热带雨林基地</>和<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>雾林边疆</>是
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>海月大陆</>,用于整体物资供应...

20030174.Original_Text: 많은 양의 물품이 오갑니다만...\n그걸 노리고 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</> 녀석들이 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>숲</>에 자리를 잡았습니다.
20030174.English_Text:
A lot of goods come and go...
At this, the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Bloodplate</> guys <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>It has settled in the forest</>.
20030174.Chinese_Text:
很多货物来来去去,但是...... 
瞄准它,<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>血流氓</>已经在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>森林</>安顿下来.

20030175.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</> says it's a lot of trouble)
20030175.Chinese_Text: （他说他在<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>养育</>上遇到了很多麻烦）

20030176.Original_Text: 그래 봐야 도적놈들에 불과하니\n우리의 정예대원들이 간다면 금방 토벌할 수 있습니다.
20030176.English_Text:
Obviously, they are just thieves.
If our elite members go, we can subdue them quickly.
20030176.Chinese_Text:
他们只是盗贼,所以
如果我们的精英成员去,我们可以很快制服他们.

20030177.Original_Text: 근데 문제는 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</> 녀석들이 여기저기 도망 다니니... \n병력을 집중하기가 어렵습니다.
20030177.English_Text:
But the problem is, the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blood Ripples</> are running around... 
It's hard to focus your forces.
20030177.Chinese_Text:
但问题是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>血人和</>人到处乱跑…… 
难以集中兵力.

20030178.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>녀석들의 거점</> 위치만 정확히 알아낼 수 있으면\n이곳에서 몰아내는 일도 시간문제일 겁니다.
20030178.English_Text:
If we can pinpoint the location of <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>their stronghold</>,
it will only be a matter of time before we get them out of here.
20030178.Chinese_Text:
如果只能确定<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>他们基地</>的位置,
把他们赶出这个地方只是时间问题.

20030179.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 将基地位置连同证据一起提交 </>)

20030180.English_Text: Really? Did you find this there?
20030180.Chinese_Text: 真的吗?你在那里找到这个吗?

20030181.Original_Text: 이거라면 상부를 설득할 충분한 증거가 될 것 같습니다.
20030181.English_Text: I think this will be enough evidence to convince the superior.
20030181.Chinese_Text: 我认为这足以说服上级.

20030182.English_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Bloodplate</>I'm going to mash this up for real this time.
20030182.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>该死的混蛋</>伙计们！这次我真的要把它完全捣碎.

20030183.Original_Text: 내가 특별 주문한 살구씨 두부를 훔쳐 간 책임을 져야지.
20030183.English_Text: I'm responsible for stealing the apricot seed tofu I ordered.
20030183.Chinese_Text: 我负责偷我点的杏子豆腐.

20030185.Original_Text: 별말 아닙니다.\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</> 녀석들은 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</>을 좀먹는 벌레 같은 존재죠.
20030185.English_Text:
It's not a big deal.
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blood Plaque</> these guys are <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sea Moon Continent</> It's like an eating worm.
20030185.Chinese_Text:
没什么大不了的
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>血族杂种</>就像是腐蚀<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>海月大陆</>的虫子.

20030186.English_Text: Our <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</> will definitely drive you out!

20030189.Original_Text: 아니 일을 하기로 했는데\n늦으면 어떻게 하냥?
20030189.English_Text:
No, I decided to work
What if I'm late?
20030189.Chinese_Text:
不,我决定工作.
如果我迟到了怎么办?

20030190.English_Text:
It's difficult like this. 
I <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Gugu</>Danyang. I can't tolerate such a thing.
20030190.Chinese_Text:
这样的话就困难了。
我<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>拒</>绝。这种东西是不能接受的。

20030191.Original_Text: 하지만 부드러운 떡, 굳은 떡 가릴 때가 아니다냥.
20030191.English_Text: But this is not the time to cover soft or hard rice cakes.
20030191.Chinese_Text: 但这不是覆盖软或硬年糕的时候.

20030194.English_Text: Then we'll see you on site!

20030195.Original_Text: 안개 그늘이 사람들의 심신에 주는 영향을\n하루빨리 조사해야한다냥.
20030195.English_Text:
The effect of the shadow of the fog on people
they should be investigated as soon as possible.
20030195.Chinese_Text:
雾霾对人身心的影响 
我们需要尽快调查.

20030196.English_Text: (Ask me to listen to the end)

20030197.Original_Text: 왜 이리 늦은 거냥?\n나 이런 거 싫어하는 거 모르냥?
20030197.English_Text:
Why are you so late?
You don't know that I hate things like this?
20030197.Chinese_Text:
你怎么这么晚?
你不知道我讨厌这样的事情吗?

20030198.Chinese_Text: 我<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>咕咕</>丹阳！我不能容忍这个！

20030199.English_Text: (Tell me to calm down for now)

20030200.Original_Text: 하지만 달콤한 감과 쓴 감 가릴 때가 아니다냥.
20030200.English_Text: But this is not the time to cover up sweet and bitter persimmons.
20030200.Chinese_Text: 但现在不是隐藏甜蜜和苦涩的时候.

20030201.English_Text: Go over there and quickly get some <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>soil</>!

20030203.Original_Text: 변명은 필요없다냥. 난 관대하다냥.\n이미 지나간 건 잊어버리고 작업에 집중하자냥!
20030203.English_Text:
No excuses. I'm generous.
Forget about the past and focus on your work!
20030203.Chinese_Text:
不需要任何借口.我很慷慨.
让我们忘记过去,专注于我们的工作！

20030204.Original_Text: 혹시 오해할까 봐 이야기하는데...\n지각했어도 보수는 전액 지급할 거다냥. 걱정 마라냥!
20030204.English_Text:
I'm talking about misunderstanding...
Even if I'm late, I'll pay the full amount. Don't worry!
20030204.Chinese_Text:
我说这个以防我误会…… 
即使我迟到了,我也会全额支付.别担心！

20030207.Original_Text: (오해할 수도 있는 거라며\n너무 당황하지 말라고 한다)
20030207.English_Text:
(It may be misunderstood
Please don't panic too much)
20030207.Chinese_Text:
（可能会被误解.
他告诉我不要太恐慌.）

20030208.English_Text: Nyan!? That one over there looks like <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Red plum</>!

20030209.English_Text: (Ask if you're referring to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Director of the Plum Blossoms</>)

20030210.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Chief</>It's weird to be here!
The nasty <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Linworm</> Ida-nyang! Get rid of it right now!
20030210.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>店长</>在这儿真奇怪！
讨厌<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>虫虫</>是Nyang！立即摆脱它！

20030211.Original_Text: 너 좀 쓸만한 것 같다냥. \n앞으로 내 짐꾼 및 경호원 하는 거 어떠냥?
20030211.English_Text:
You seem to be of some use. 
How about working as my porter and bodyguard in the future?
20030211.Chinese_Text:
你好像有点用
 以后做我的搬运工和保镖怎么样?

20030212.English_Text: (He said it would be a little difficult because he had other work to do)
20030212.Chinese_Text: （他说会有点困难,因为他还有其他工作要做）

20030213.Original_Text: 다른 일? 내가 너희 회사랑 이야기해보겠다냥.
20030213.English_Text: Anything else? I'm going to talk to your company.
20030213.Chinese_Text: 还有什么?我想和贵公司谈谈.

20030214.Original_Text: (자신은 회사 소속이 아니며\n다른 사람과 착각한 것 같다고 한다)
20030214.English_Text:
(He says he doesn't belong to a company
I think he's mistaken for someone else)
20030214.Chinese_Text: （他与公司无关,据说是他误认为是别人.）

20030215.Original_Text: 그런 거냥!? 왜 진작 말을 안 한 거냥?
20030215.English_Text: Like that!? Why didn't you tell me earlier?
20030215.Chinese_Text: 像那样！?你怎么不早告诉我?

20030216.Original_Text: 왜 미리 말을 안 해서\n날 이상한 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>바롱</>으로 만드는 거냥!
20030216.English_Text:
Why didn't you tell me in advance
You're making me a weird <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Barong</>!
20030216.Chinese_Text:
为什么不提前告诉我? 
 好像把我变成了怪人 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]> Barong </>！

20030217.English_Text: (There seems to be a communication problem)

20030218.Chinese_Text: 就像我知道的我很好我很慷慨.

20030219.Original_Text: 회사고 뭐고 관계없이 \n나랑 같이 일할 마음은 없는 거냥?
20030219.English_Text:
Doesn't matter what company,
You don't want to work with me?
20030219.Chinese_Text:
不管是什么公司什么的,
你有没有跟我合作的打算?

20030220.Original_Text: 넌 내가 보기엔 좀 쓸만한 것 같다냥.\n내 말을 좀 들어봐라냥.
20030220.English_Text:
You seem to me to be quite useful.
Listen to me.
20030220.Chinese_Text:
我觉得你有点用.
听我说.

20030222.Original_Text: 현재 이곳엔 물이 별로 없지만, 과거엔 물이 많았다냥.
20030222.English_Text: There is not much water here now, but there was a lot of water in the past.
20030222.Chinese_Text: 现在这里没有多少水,但过去有很多水.

20030223.Original_Text: "예전 초기 탐사대 소속이셨던 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>노다양</> 선생님께서 \n남기신 기록에 의하면..."
20030223.English_Text:
According to the records left by 
the teacher '<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Da Yang No</>', who was a member of the former expedition team...
20030223.Chinese_Text:
根据原探险队队员
老师‘<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>无大洋</>’留下的记录……

20030224.Original_Text: 엄청나게 큰 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>환영 대인면충</>이 나타나서 환각 안개를 내뿜기 시작했고, \n그 이후에 물이 메마르기 시작했다고 한다냥.
20030224.English_Text:
It is said that a huge <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Illusion Anti-Personal Insect</> appeared and started emitting a psychedelic mist,
after that the water began to dry up.
20030224.Chinese_Text:
据说巨大的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>幻化反人类昆虫</>出现,开始散发出迷幻的雾气,
之后,水开始干涸.

20030227.Original_Text: 그래, 혹시 네가 위험에 빠질 수도 있으니 \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>환영 대인면충</>이 나오는 위치를 알려주겠다냥.
20030227.English_Text:
Yeah, just in case you're in danger, I'll let you know where the 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Welcome Anti-Personal Insect</> comes from.
20030227.Chinese_Text:
是的,万一遇到危险,我来告诉你
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>欢迎反人虫</>出来的地方.

20030229.Original_Text: 사양하지 않아도 된다냥. \n다 널 걱정해서 그러는 거다냥. 간다냥!
20030229.English_Text:
You don't have to give up. 
It's all because I'm worried about you. I'm going!
20030229.Chinese_Text:
您不必指定. 
 都是因为担心你.我要去！

20030230.Original_Text: "아까 이야기했던 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>노다양</> 선생님께선\n결국 환각 안개에 목숨을 잃으셨다냥."
20030230.English_Text:
The teacher '<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>No Dayang</>' that I talked about earlier
In the end, he lost his life in the hallucinogenic fog.
20030230.Chinese_Text:
至于我刚才讲的‘<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>无大洋</>’老师,
他最终在幻雾中丧生.

20030231.Original_Text: 안개에 당한 자가 한둘이 아니었는데...\n병과 환각에 의해 죽어 나갔다고 한다냥.
20030231.English_Text:
Not one or two people were affected by the fog...
It is said that they died from disease and hallucinations.
20030231.Chinese_Text:
没有一两个人受到大雾的影响…… 
据说他们死于疾病和幻觉.

20030232.Original_Text: 독은 소속 단체나 지위고하를 가리지도 않았다냥.
20030232.English_Text: The poison did not discriminate between affiliation or rank.
20030232.Chinese_Text: 毒药根本不在乎自己所属的团体,也不在乎自己的等级.

20030233.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>의 장로였던 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>비천</>이란 자도 다른 자를 보호하려고\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>대인면충</>을 상대하다 목숨을 잃었다고 기록에 나온다냥.
20030233.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Elder of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</>, even the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Abominable</> tried to protect others
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The records say that he lost his life while dealing with the Human Insect</>.
20030233.Chinese_Text:
据记载,<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>的长辈<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>碧川</>,也为了保护他人而在与
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>反人类虫</>打交道时丧生.

20030234.Original_Text: 저쪽에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>환영 대인면충</>이 자주 출몰한다고 하니...\n혼자 상대하기 어려울 거다냥. 우선 도망쳐라냥.
20030234.English_Text:
They say that <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Welcome anti-personnel insect</> often appears over there...
It will be difficult to deal with alone. Run away first.
20030234.Chinese_Text:
据说<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>欢迎反人类的昆虫</>经常出现在那里... 
单独对付会很困难.首先,逃跑.

20030236.Original_Text: 애초에 인간이 이곳에 오지 않았다면,\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>대인면충</>이 환각 안개를 뿜지 않았을지도 모른다냥.
20030236.English_Text:
If humans hadn't come here in the first place,
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Antihuman Insect</> might not have emitted a hallucinogenic mist.
20030236.Chinese_Text:
如果不是人类当初来到这里,
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>反人类蠕虫</>可能不会散发出迷幻的雾气.

20030237.Original_Text: 그랬으면 사람도 죽지 않고,\n이곳의 물도 풍부하지 않았을까 생각해 본다냥...
20030237.English_Text:
If that were the case, no one would die,
I wonder if the water here would be plentiful...
20030237.Chinese_Text:
那样的话就不会有人死了,而且
不知道这里的水会不会很充足……

20030239.English_Text: (Are you going to tell me to step back?)

20030240.Original_Text: 어이! 뭐 하시는 거요? 물러서시오!\n여기서 떨어지면 위험하잖소.
20030240.English_Text:
Hey! What are you doing? Back off!
It's dangerous to fall from here.
20030240.Chinese_Text:
嘿！你在干嘛?退后！ 
 从这里跌落很危险.

20030242.Original_Text: 이곳 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>폭포</>는 경치가 좋아... 사람들이 접근하다가\n떨어져서 크게 다치거나 죽기도 했다오.
20030242.English_Text:
The <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Waterfall</> here has a beautiful view... People approached it and fell
and got seriously injured or killed.
20030242.Chinese_Text:
这里<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>瀑布</>很美……人们靠近它并掉下
并受重伤或死亡.

20030243.Original_Text: 그러고 보니 예전에도 그랬지만, \n아직도 안전 난간이 하나 없구먼그래.
20030243.English_Text:
Come to think of it, it's been like that before,
but there's still no safety railing.
20030243.Chinese_Text:
想来,以前也是这样,但
还是没有安全栏杆.

20030245.Original_Text: 내가 가기 전에 난간이라도 하나 만들고 가야겠소.
20030245.English_Text: I'm going to make a railing before I go.
20030245.Chinese_Text: 在我走之前,我要做一个栏杆.

20030246.Original_Text: 습기를 먹어도 괜찮을 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>나무</>와 거기에 바를 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>기름</>...\n그 정도만 있으면 나머진 어떻게든 될 것 같소.
20030246.English_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Wood</> which should be ok for moisture and <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Oil</>... 
If that's enough, I think the rest will be okay.
20030246.Chinese_Text:
淋湿也没关系 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>木</>擦在上面 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>油</>...
 有这么多,我想剩下的就可以了.

20030247.Original_Text: 오. 좋은 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>재료</>로군. 이거면 안전 난간을 만들 수 있겠어.
20030247.English_Text: Oh. Nice <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Material</>. This could make a safety railing.
20030247.Chinese_Text: 五.好<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>配料</>.这可以制作安全栏杆.

20030248.Original_Text: 그 사고가 나기 전에 설치했었어야 했는데...
20030248.English_Text: I should have installed it before that accident...
20030248.Chinese_Text: 我应该在事故发生前安装它...

20030249.Original_Text: 그랬으면 오늘 여기에도 같이 올 수 있지 않았을까?
20030249.English_Text: If that were the case, wouldn't it have been possible to come here today too?
20030249.Chinese_Text: 如果是这样,今天岂不是也能来到这里?

20030250.English_Text: (Ask if anything bad happened in the past)
20030250.Chinese_Text: （问过去有没有什么不好的事情发生）

20030251.Original_Text: 허허... 지난 일은 지난 일이고...\n앞으로 이곳에 다른 사고가 없었으면 좋겠군.
20030251.English_Text:
Heh heh... The past is a thing of the past...
I hope there will be no other accidents here in the future.
20030251.Chinese_Text:
呵呵……过去的事已经过去了…… 
希望以后不要再有什么意外了.

20030252.Original_Text: 그래야 내 마음이 좀 편할 것 같구만...
20030252.English_Text: I think that will put my mind at ease...
20030252.Chinese_Text: 我想这会让我的心情放松...

20030253.Original_Text: 내가 졌군... 이렇게 된 이상 내가 갈 수밖에...
20030253.English_Text: I lost... Now that this has happened, I have no choice but to go...
20030253.Chinese_Text: 我输了……既然已经发生了,我也只能走了……

20030254.Original_Text: 그동안 고마웠어. 전우들... \n내 유서는 서랍장 안에 있으니...
20030254.English_Text:
Thank you for all this time. Comrades... 
My will is in the chest of drawers...
20030254.Chinese_Text:
谢谢你那段时间.同志们…… 
我的遗嘱在五斗柜里……

20030256.Original_Text: 제가 가위바위보에서 지는 바람에... \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>낙원대성</>을 관측하는 임무를 맡았습니다.
20030256.English_Text:
I lost at the rock, paper, scissors... 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Paradise Daeseong</> tasked with observing.
20030256.Chinese_Text:
我迷失在石头、纸、剪刀里…… 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>我被分配了观察天堂大堡垒</>的任务.

20030258.Original_Text: 아닙니다. 장난치고 있는 겁니다.\n대부분의 경우는 그리 위험하지 않습니다.
20030258.English_Text:
No. I'm just kidding.
Most of the time it's not that dangerous.
20030258.Chinese_Text:
不.你在开玩笑. 
 大多数情况下,它不是很危险.

20030260.Original_Text: 음... 그래서 유서는 써서 보관할 것을 권하고 있습니다.
20030260.English_Text: Um... that's why I recommend writing a will and keeping it.
20030260.Chinese_Text: 嗯……这就是为什么我建议写一份遗嘱并保留它.

20030261.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>낙원대성</>의 기분에 따라 오늘은 어디까지 접근해도 되는지...\n대원이나 마차를 움직여도 될지 등을 결정하거든요.
20030261.English_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Paradise Daeseong</>'s mood determines how far you can approach today...
You can move crew or wagons, etc.
20030261.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]> Nakwon Daesung </> 取决于你今天能接近多远... 
 它决定你是否可以移动船员或马车.

20030262.Original_Text: 그래서 누군가 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>낙원대성</>을 관측할 필요가 있는 거예요.
20030262.English_Text: That's why someone needs to observe <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Paradise</>.
20030262.Chinese_Text: 所以需要有人观察<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>洛院大城</>.

20030264.Original_Text: 교범 안에 다 있습니다. 오랜 시간 동안 정리해 왔죠.
20030264.English_Text: It's all in the manual. I've been putting it together for a long time.
20030264.Chinese_Text: 说明书上都有.我已经把它放在一起很久了.

20030265.Original_Text: 어떤 행동이 어떤 기분이라고 하는 게 완전히 맞진 않지만,\n그래도 대부분 맞습니다.
20030265.English_Text:
It's not entirely correct to say what an action feels like,
but it's mostly true.
20030265.Chinese_Text:
说一个动作是一种感觉并不完全正确,但
虽然大部分是真的.

20030266.English_Text: (Then ask when should you be careful)
20030266.Chinese_Text: （然后问你什么时候应该小心?）

20030267.Original_Text: 대부분은 괜찮습니다. 일 년에 한 두 번 정도...\n극대노 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>낙원대성</>일때가 있어요.
20030267.English_Text:
Most of the time it's fine. Once or twice a year or so...
Sometimes it's extremely annoying <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Paradise of Paradise</>.
20030267.Chinese_Text:
他们中的大多数都很好.一年一两次左右……有时是
狂怒、<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>天堂、</>.

20030268.Original_Text: 그땐 관측병의 목숨이 위험할 수 있습니다.\n바로 철수해야 하죠.
20030268.English_Text:
The life of the observer may be in danger then.
We must withdraw immediately.
20030268.Chinese_Text:
届时,观察者的生命可能处于危险之中 
我们必须立即撤退.

20030269.Original_Text: 부대로 돌아와 모든 활동을 멈추고,\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>낙원 계곡</>의 출입을 금지하기도 합니다.
20030269.English_Text:
Return to unit, stop all activity,
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Paradise Valley</> barred.
20030269.Chinese_Text:
返回单位后,停止一切活动,并禁止进入
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>天堂谷</>.

20030271.Original_Text: "어제 기분은 양호였습니다. 오늘도 아마 괜찮을 것 같은데...\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>목치본</> 대원을 따라 가보시죠."
20030271.English_Text:
Yesterday I was feeling 'good'. I think I'll be fine today...
Let's follow the crew <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Mockprint</>.
20030271.Chinese_Text:
昨天我感觉“很好”.我想你今天会没事的...
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>木知本</> 跟着大元走吧.

20030272.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>낙원대성</>이 항상 같은 자리에 있는 건 아니지만...\n이곳은 관찰하기에 꽤 괜찮은 자리입니다.
20030272.English_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Paradise Palace</> isn't always in the same spot...
This is a pretty good spot to observe.
20030272.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>洛院大城</>不总是在同一个地方... 
这是一个很好的观察点.

20030274.Original_Text: 처음에는 잘 안 보일 수 있습니다.\n보다 보면 익숙해집니다. 금방 보이죠.
20030274.English_Text:
It may be hard to see at first.
The more you look, the more you get used to it. You'll see it quickly.
20030274.Chinese_Text:
一开始可能很难看,看
就习惯了.一会儿见.

20030276.Original_Text: 오늘은 소노 정도인 것 같습니다.\n더 접근하는 건 안 좋겠어요.
20030276.English_Text:
I think it's about Sono today.
I don't want to get any closer.
20030276.Chinese_Text:
我想今天是关于Sono的.
靠近一点不好.

20030277.English_Text:
(I can't see anything from afar
Praise it for being great)
20030277.Chinese_Text:
（因为太远什么都看不到 
 夸他厉害）

20030278.Original_Text: 하핫! 뭘요. 매일 보는 거니까요.\n조금 더 안쪽으로 가볼까요?
20030278.English_Text:
Haha! What. I see it every day.
Shall we go a little further inside?
20030278.Chinese_Text:
哈哈！什么.我每天都看到.
我们要不要再往里走一点?

20030279.English_Text:
(If it's Sono, it's a little anger,
I ask if you're okay)
20030279.Chinese_Text:
（如果是园子,有点生气.
问你是否还好.）

20030280.English_Text: Just trust me and follow me.

20030304.Original_Text: 소노일 때 섣부른 행동을 해서...\n괜히 낙원족을 자극했네요.
20030304.English_Text:
I acted hastily when I was a Sono...
I just provoked the Paradise people.
20030304.Chinese_Text:
我是园子的时候就仓促行事…… 
白白刺激了乐园人.

20030306.Original_Text: 일단 지금 당장은 괜찮습니다만...\n여길 벗어나는 게 좋겠습니다.
20030306.English_Text:
It's fine for now, but...
You'd better get out of here.
20030306.Chinese_Text:
暂时还好,不过…… 
 离开这里比较好.

20030307.English_Text: You must avoid anything that offends Paradise!
20030307.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]> 任何扰乱天堂</>的事一定要避免
！

20030308.Original_Text: 어휴... 오늘 수명이 십 년 준 것 같네요.
20030308.English_Text: Uh huh... I think I've given you ten years of life today.
20030308.Chinese_Text: 呃……我想我今天已经给了你十年的生命.

20030309.Original_Text: 아니... 거기도 우리 관할구역이야?\n하... 정말 너무 한 거 아닌가?
20030309.English_Text:
No... that's our jurisdiction too?
Ha... Wasn't that really too much?
20030309.Chinese_Text:
不……那也是我们的管辖范围吗?
哈……那是不是真的太多了?

20030311.Original_Text: 아! 오셨습니까? 무슨 일이냐구요? 그게...\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</> 내부의 일이긴 합니다만...
20030311.English_Text:
Ah! Are you here? What's going on? That's...
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Discipline</> internal business...
20030311.Chinese_Text:
啊!你在这里这是怎么回事?那是……
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>纪律</> 这是内部工作,但是……

20030312.Original_Text: 저기 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>버려진 감시탑</>과 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>주변 해변</> 지역이\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>예도항</> 관할 지역이 아니라는 게 이상해서요.
20030312.English_Text:
There are <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Abandoned Watchtower</> and <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Nearby Beach</> area
<textColor= [110:216:175:255]>Yedo Port</> It's strange that it's not a jurisdiction.
20030312.Chinese_Text:
奇怪的是<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>废弃的瞭望塔</>和<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>周围的海滩</>不在
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>夜都行</>的管辖范围内.

20030313.English_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>The distance from the beach</> says it looks closer to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Yedo Port</> )
20030313.Chinese_Text: （如果从<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>海滩</>看距离,据说它看起来更接近<textColor=[110:216:175:255]> Yedo Port </>）

20030314.Original_Text: 근데 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>버려진 감시탑</>과의 거리는 거점이 가깝긴 합니다.
20030314.English_Text: But <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Abandoned Watchtower</> is close to the base.
20030314.Chinese_Text: 但是距离<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>废弃的瞭望塔</>距离基地很近.

20030315.Original_Text: 그리고 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>감시탑</>을 중심으로 하여 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>주변 해변가</>가\n동일 관할구역으로 되어 있어서요.
20030315.English_Text:
And with <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>watchtower</> as the center, <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>surrounding beaches</> have
same jurisdiction It's a zone.
20030315.Chinese_Text:
并以<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>瞭望塔</>为中心,<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>周边海滩</>与
同属管辖.

20030316.Original_Text: (그렇게 생각하면 그것도 맞는 것 같다고 한다)
20030316.English_Text: (If you think about it that way, it seems to be true as well)
20030316.Chinese_Text: （如果你这样想,听起来你是对的.）

20030317.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>예도항</>에 주둔 병력도 많고 하니 \n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>감시탑</>과 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해변</>까지 맡아줘도 괜찮을 것 같은데...
20030317.English_Text:
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>There are many troops stationed at Yedo Port</>. 
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Watch Tower</> and < textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Beach</> I think it would be ok to leave it...
20030317.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>因为在夜都港</>驻扎了很多军队,所以我认为接管
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>瞭望塔</>和<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>海滩</>就可以了……

20030318.Original_Text: 이미 정해진 거니 어쩔 수 없죠.\n그냥 저희가 처리해야죠.
20030318.English_Text:
It's already decided, so we can't help it.
We just have to deal with it.
20030318.Chinese_Text:
已经决定了,我们也无能为力.
我们只需要处理它.

20030320.Original_Text: 예. 요즘 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>해안 생물</>들이 이상 번식을 해서...\n감당할 수가 없는 수준입니다.
20030320.English_Text:
Yes. These days, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>coastal creatures</> have reproduced abnormally...
This is an unbearable level.
20030320.Chinese_Text:
是的.这几天<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>海生物</>异常繁殖…… 
这是不能容忍的水平.

20030321.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>예도항</> 쪽에 부탁해서 고개를 숙이기도 싫고...\n그런 곤란한 상황입니다.
20030321.English_Text:
I don't want to bow my head to ask from <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Yedohang</>...
It's such a difficult situation.
20030321.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]> 我不想低头,因为我在夜都港 </> 上问过…… 
 真是太困难了.

20030322.Original_Text: 이젠 근무 끝나고 가서 쉴 곳도 없다니깐...
20030322.English_Text: Now that I have no place to rest after work...
20030322.Chinese_Text: 现在下班没地方休息了……

20030323.Original_Text: 석양 보면서 청주 한잔하는 게 낙이었는데...
20030323.English_Text: It was a pleasure to drink sake while watching the sunset...
20030323.Chinese_Text: 边看日落边喝一杯清酒真是太好了...

20030324.English_Text: (Ask if there is a nice place)

20030325.English_Text:
It was there.
No, it is still there.
20030325.Chinese_Text:
有.
没有.它仍然存在.

20030326.Original_Text: 거점 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>남쪽 해변가</>에 해 질 무렵에 가면 경치가 아주 좋거든요.
20030326.English_Text: The view at sunset on the base <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>South Beach</> is very beautiful.
20030326.Chinese_Text: 如果在日落时分去基地<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>南海滩</>,风景非常好.

20030328.Original_Text: 예전에도 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>어둑시니</>가 없는 건 아니었는데...\n이 정도는 아니었거든요.
20030328.English_Text:
It wasn't that <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>You're Dark</> wasn't there before...
It wasn't like this.

20030329.English_Text: There aren't many, so I just had to deal with them or avoid them...
20030329.Chinese_Text: 因为人不多,对付或者避开就够了……

20030330.Original_Text: 요즘은 수가 너무 많아져서...\n이름을 그냥 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>어둑시니</> 해변이라고 불러야 할 정도예요.
20030330.English_Text:
These days there are so many...
I have to call them <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>You're Dark</> Beach.
20030330.Chinese_Text:
这些天,数量增长了这么多...... 
我只需要叫他们<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>黑暗</>海滩.

20030331.Original_Text: 청주 한잔 먹자고 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</> 대원들 다 데리고 가서\n해변 정리하자고 할 수도 없고요.
20030331.English_Text:
I can't even tell you to take all the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Western</> crew
to clean up the beach to have a glass of sake.
20030331.Chinese_Text:
来杯清州吧 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]> 苏阳 </> 我不能带着所有的船员说
 我们清理海滩吧.

20030332.English_Text:
(They say they're sorry
the place to change their mind is gone)
20030332.Chinese_Text:
（改变心情的地方不见了.
说声对不起）

20030333.Original_Text: 맞습니다! <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>고곤대</>님도\n가끔 술을 좀 드셔야 기분이 풀리시는데...
20030333.English_Text:
That's right! <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Kogondae</> also
Sometimes you need a drink to feel better...
20030333.Chinese_Text:
是的！ <textColor=[78:148:215:255]> Kogon 大学 </> Nim 也
 有时你需要喝一杯才能感觉更好......

20030334.Original_Text: 짜증 나면 저한테 막 푸신다니까요!\n제가 힘들어요. 뭐라고 할 수도 없고...
20030334.English_Text:
Because when you get annoyed, you just solve it for me!
I'm having a hard time. I can't say anything...
20030334.Chinese_Text:
因为你生气了,你就帮我解决吧！
我很难受.我什么也说不出来...

20030335.Original_Text: 오! 괜찮으시면 혹시 길을 좀 여쭤봐도 괜찮을까요?
20030335.English_Text: Oh! Is it okay if I ask for directions?

20030337.Original_Text: 제가 지금 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>비경의 자드락</>으로 가는 길인데요.\n이제 거의 다 온 걸까요?
20030337.English_Text:
I'm on my way to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Unexplored Jadrak</> now.
Am I almost there now?
20030337.Chinese_Text:
我正在前往<textColor=[110:216:175:255]> Unexplored Jadrak </>. 
 我快到了吗?

20030338.English_Text: (I don't think it will be close)

20030342.Original_Text: 에이~ 그럴 리가요. 전 방향감각이 엄청 좋은데요.\n반대로 왔을 리가 없어요.
20030342.English_Text:
Ah~ It can be. I have a very good sense of direction.
I can't have come the other way.
20030342.Chinese_Text:
啊可以吗我的方向感非常好.
我不能走反方向.

20030345.Original_Text: 요즘 세상이 흉흉하던데...\n뭔가 세상의 방향 축이 틀어졌다거나?
20030345.English_Text:
The world is ugly these days...
Something is wrong with the direction of the world?
20030345.Chinese_Text:
现在的世界很丑…… 
 世界方向的轴有什么问题吗?

20030346.English_Text:
(Does not answer, and offers
guide you to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Misty Forest Front</>)
20030346.Chinese_Text:
（不回答,提供引导
到<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>迷雾森林边境</>）

20030347.Original_Text: 아! 여기에 오니 대략 알 것 같습니다.
20030347.English_Text: Ah! Coming here, I think I know about it.
20030347.Chinese_Text: 啊!来到这里,我想你知道了.

20030348.Original_Text: 이제 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>혈비의 숲</> 정도 온 거죠?\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</>는 조심하는 게 좋아요!
20030348.English_Text:
Have you come to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Forest of Blood</> now?
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blood Plaque</> Better be careful!

20030349.English_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>The Forest of Blood</> is still a long way off)

20030350.Original_Text: 엥? 제 거리방향감각은 사람들이\n막 놀랄 정도인데... 확실한 거예요?
20030350.English_Text:
Huh? My sense of distance direction is something that people
stumble upon... Are you sure?
20030350.Chinese_Text:
诶?我对距离的方向感如此惊人,人们
...你确定吗?

20030351.English_Text:
(I think it's a wonderful sense of direction
but doesn't say anything)
20030351.Chinese_Text:
（我认为这是一种美妙的方向感,但
他什么也没说）

20030353.English_Text:
(<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Unexpected Jadrak</>
Ask if I can go alone)
20030353.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>直到未知的贾扎克</>
问他是否可以一个人去）

20030354.English_Text:
No problem normally...
The world is strange these days...
20030354.Chinese_Text:
正常情况下不会有问题的…… 
现在的世界很奇怪……

20030355.English_Text:
I would like to ask <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Younggyowon</> to
transport.

20030356.English_Text: (he said he thought it really well)

20030357.Chinese_Text: 我浪费了一些时间.哈哈！

20030358.Original_Text: (혹시 자신도 같이 갈 수 있냐고 묻는다)
20030358.English_Text: (Ask if you can go with me too)
20030358.Chinese_Text: （我问我是否也可以和你一起去）

20030360.English_Text: Speak to me when you're ready.
20030360.Chinese_Text: 当你准备好了,跟我说话.

20030365.Original_Text: (앞으로도 장거리 이동할 때\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>영교원</>에 가는 게 좋겠다고 한다)
20030365.English_Text: (They say it would be better to go to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Younggyowon</> when traveling long distances in the future)
20030365.Chinese_Text:
（据说以后长途旅行最好去
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>英教员</>）

20030366.English_Text:
Is that right? It's a little dizzy,
but it's comfortable.
20030366.Chinese_Text:
是的?有点头晕,不过
很舒服.

20030368.Original_Text: 아~ 이제 앞이 깜깜하다. 앞이 안 보인다.
20030368.English_Text: Ah~ It's dark now. I can't see.
20030368.Chinese_Text: 啊,现在天黑了.看不见前方

20030370.English_Text: Ah! No. I was just talking to myself.

20030371.Original_Text: 금주에 진행해야 할 작업을 생각하다 보니...\n갑자기 시야가 좁아져서요.
20030371.English_Text:
Thinking about the work to be done this week...
My vision suddenly narrowed.
20030371.Chinese_Text:
就在想着这周要做的工作的时候…… 
我的视野突然变窄了.

20030372.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>낙원대성</>의 관측만 할 순 없는 거겠죠.\n이것도 당연히 해야 할 일입니다.
20030372.English_Text:
You can't just observe <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Nakwondaeseong</>.
This is something we should do of course.
20030372.Chinese_Text: 只观察<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>洛院大城</>是不可能的.

20030374.English_Text:
Should we call it weeding?
It's a regular job of getting rid of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Outbreak</>.
20030374.Chinese_Text:
应该叫除草吗? 
 定期清除<textColor=[215:94:94:255]> 爆发</>.

20030375.Original_Text: 아니네요. 풀 뽑다가 공격받아 죽진 않을 테니까...
20030375.English_Text: No. I won't be attacked and killed while pulling grass...
20030375.Chinese_Text: 不.拔草时被攻击不会死...

20030376.Original_Text: 전투 살충이라고 부르는 게 적절할 것 같습니다.
20030376.English_Text: I think it would be appropriate to call it a combat insecticide.
20030376.Chinese_Text: 我认为将其称为战斗杀虫剂更合适.

20030377.English_Text: Are you sure you want to come in here?

20030379.English_Text: If you've come this far, you'll be confident in your skills...
20030379.Chinese_Text: 如果你已经走到这一步,你会对自己的技能充满信心,但是......

20030380.English_Text: You'd better watch out for the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Flag hair</> though.
20030380.Chinese_Text: 不过,你最好小心<textColor=[215:94:94:255]> 帕尔多克莫 </>.

20030382.Original_Text: 극히 위험한 거대 괴물이라고 설명해 드리면 될까요?
20030382.English_Text: Can I describe it as an extremely dangerous giant monster?
20030382.Chinese_Text: 你能形容它是一个极其危险的巨型怪物吗?

20030383.English_Text: It doesn't usually come out of its nest...
20030383.Chinese_Text: 它们通常不会从巢穴中出来,但是...

20030384.English_Text: If you leave the nest, you're in trouble.
20030384.Chinese_Text: 如果他们离开巢穴,那是一件大事.

20030385.English_Text:
(If you find a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Palgfish</> nearby,
I will tell you the story)
20030385.Chinese_Text:
（如果在附近找到<textColor=[215:94:94:255]> 帕尔多克莫 </>,他会告诉你
的故事）

20030386.English_Text:
(For now, I'll tell you that I didn't see
the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Palgfish</> around)
20030386.Chinese_Text:
（目前,据说<textColor=[215:94:94:255]> 帕尔多克莫 </> 没有出现
.）

20030387.English_Text:
Good luck.
There's a <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Nest</> inside over there...
20030387.Chinese_Text:
我很高兴.
后面有个<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>巢</>……

20030388.Chinese_Text: 不要仅仅出于好奇而接近它.

20030390.English_Text: Hey! There! Take a look here!
20030390.Chinese_Text: 打扰一下！打扰一下！看看这里！

20030392.Original_Text: 지금 약을 만들고 있는데\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>이끼</>가 쪼끔 부족하다냥!
20030392.English_Text: I'm making medicine right now, and I'm a little short on <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>moss</>!
20030392.Chinese_Text:
我现在正在做药,但是
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>苔</>有点缺乏！

20030393.English_Text: Um... um... it's really not enough.

20030394.English_Text: (It's okay, so I tell you to talk comfortably)
20030394.Chinese_Text: （没关系,所以我会告诉你放轻松）

20030395.English_Text:
Animated <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Tree Spirit</> a precious <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Moss</>Danyang that only grows
 on the body!
20030395.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]> 动画树灵</> 只长在身体上的珍贵
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 苔藓</> 丹阳！

20030396.English_Text: That's a little... no need a lot!

20030397.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ask if I can get 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Moss</> from the Arbor</> )

20030398.English_Text:
You can get it from
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Arbor Spirit</> on <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sunrise Ramp</>!
20030398.Chinese_Text:
您可以从<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>日出坡</>Nyang的
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>树灵</>获得！

20030402.English_Text:
No... I'd like to scrape the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Arbor</> etc.
for an hour
20030402.Chinese_Text:
不……我把
背面的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>树精</>刮了一个小时.

20030403.English_Text: I only got about half of this!
20030403.Chinese_Text: 我只得到了这一半的一半！

20030404.Original_Text: 어떻게 한 거냥? 나도 배우고 싶다냥!
20030404.English_Text: How did you do it? I want to learn too!
20030404.Chinese_Text: 你是怎么做的?我也想学！

20030405.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ask if you want to scratch the back of the arboreal</>)

20030406.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>If you scratch the back of a tree spirit</>,
it feels great!
20030406.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>如果你刮伤树灵</>等
感觉好极了！

20030407.English_Text:
(He said it wasn't really a big deal
He blurs out the end of his sentence)
20030407.Chinese_Text:
（他说这没什么大不了的
把他话的结尾弄糊涂了）

20030409.Original_Text: 근처를 순찰하고 있는데... 갑자기 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>도화상전</>의 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>곽호룡</>님이 계신 거예요.
20030409.English_Text: I was patrolling nearby... Suddenly, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Drawings</> <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ho-Ryong Kwak</> You are there.
20030409.Chinese_Text: 在该地区巡逻时…… 突然,<textColor=[78:148:215:255]> 多和田</> 的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]> 郭浩龙</> 出现了.

20030410.Original_Text: 저희 상관은 아니지만... 그래도 예의상 가서 인사를 드렸는데...
20030410.English_Text: It's not our boss... but I went to greet him as a courtesy...
20030410.Chinese_Text: 不是我们的老板,但是……不过,我还是去打招呼了……

20030413.Original_Text: 근데 자세히 봤더니! 이거 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>곽호룡</>님이 아닌 겁니다.
20030413.English_Text: But I looked closely! This is not <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ho-Ryong Kwak</>.
20030413.Chinese_Text: 但是我仔细看了！这不是<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>郭浩龙</>.

20030416.English_Text: But... I was about to skip this one...

20030419.Original_Text: 그럼요! 가서 인사를 드렸죠. 근데... 또 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>환영</>이네요.
20030419.English_Text: Okay! I went and said hello, but... again <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Welcome</>
20030419.Chinese_Text: 当然！我走过去打了声招呼.但是……又是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>欢迎</>.

20030420.Original_Text: 아. 그 이후로 순찰 나가기도 싫더라고요.
20030420.English_Text: Oh, I didn't want to go out on patrol after that.
20030420.Chinese_Text: 啊.在那之后,我不想出去巡逻了.

20030422.Original_Text: (음... 아직 자기 상태에 대한 자각이 없는 걸까?)
20030422.English_Text: (Um... Are you still not aware of your condition?)
20030422.Chinese_Text: （嗯……你还不知道自己的情况吗?）

20030423.Original_Text: (이렇게 혼령을 두려워한다면...\n사실을 말하지 않는 게 좋을지도 모르겠다)
20030423.English_Text:
(If you're afraid of ghosts like this...
It might be better not to tell the truth)
20030423.Chinese_Text:
（如果你像这样害怕鬼……
最好不要说实话）

20030424.English_Text: (Leave me to fight the soul fire)
20030424.Chinese_Text: （他们说让我来消灭灵魂之火）

20030425.Original_Text: 오, 소협이군요. 안그래도 소협이 생각나던 참이었습니다.
20030425.English_Text: Oh, that's a small group. That's what I was thinking of, though.
20030425.Chinese_Text: 오, 소협이군요. 안그래도 소협이 생각나던 참이었습니다.

20030427.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</>가 통행로를 습격하는 일이 잦아지고 있다는 보고입니다. 더 이상 좌시할 수 없습니다. 그래서 소협께 부탁을 하나 할까 합니다.
20030427.English_Text: This is a report that <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blood Plague</> is attacking the passageways more often. I can't stand it any longer. So may I ask you a favor? do.
20030427.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</>가 통행로를 습격하는 일이 잦아지고 있다는 보고입니다. 더 이상 좌시할 수 없습니다. 그래서 소협께 부탁을 하나 할까 합니다.

20030429.Original_Text: 함정을 만들어 배치할 계획입니다. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>골짜기 바람길</>에서 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>암각다귀의 뿔</>을 준비해주시면 나머지 재료는 저희가 준비하겠습니다.
20030429.English_Text: I plan to create and place a trap. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Valley Windway</> in <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Rock Crow Horn If you prepare </>, we will prepare the rest of the ingredients.
20030429.Chinese_Text: 함정을 만들어 배치할 계획입니다. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>골짜기 바람길</>에서 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>암각다귀의 뿔</>을 준비해주시면 나머지 재료는 저희가 준비하겠습니다.

20030430.Original_Text: 감사합니다. 소협. 덕분에 무사히 함정을 설치할 수 있었습니다.
20030430.English_Text: Thank you. Small. Thanks to you, we were able to set up the trap safely.
20030430.Chinese_Text: 감사합니다. 소협. 덕분에 무사히 함정을 설치할 수 있었습니다.

20030432.Original_Text: 이걸로 잠시나마 통행로의 안전이 확보되었으면 좋겠네요. 자 약소한 보상을 준비했습니다. 사양말고 받아주십시오. 그럼 무운을 빌겠습니다.
20030432.English_Text: I hope this will secure the passageway for a while. Now, I have prepared a small reward. Please accept it without hesitation. I wish you good luck.
20030432.Chinese_Text: 이걸로 잠시나마 통행로의 안전이 확보되었으면 좋겠네요. 자 약소한 보상을 준비했습니다. 사양말고 받아주십시오. 그럼 무운을 빌겠습니다.

20030434.Original_Text: 오, 자네. 안그래도 잘왔네. 자네한테 부탁할 게 하나 있네.
20030434.English_Text: Oh, dear. Well done anyway. I have a favor to ask of you.
20030434.Chinese_Text: 오, 자네. 안그래도 잘왔네. 자네한테 부탁할 게 하나 있네.

20030436.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>안개 그늘 숲</>의 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>환영</>들을 좀 처치해주게. 일꾼들이 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>환영</>이 무서워서 도저히 일을 할 수 없다는 구만.
20030436.English_Text: Destroy some <textColor=[110:216:175:255]><textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Illusion</> of <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Mistshade Forest</>. textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Welcome</>I can't work because I'm afraid.
20030436.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>안개 그늘 숲</>의 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>환영</>들을 좀 처치해주게. 일꾼들이 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>환영</>이 무서워서 도저히 일을 할 수 없다는 구만.

20030437.English_Text: (It seems to be understandable to some extent)

20030438.English_Text: I was going to do it myself, but there is also a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Illusion in my form</> or something.
20030438.Chinese_Text: 내가 직접 나서려고 했는데, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>내 모습을 한 환영</>도 있다지 뭔가. 영 꺼림칙해서 말이야.

20030440.English_Text: Thank you. My case works great.

20030441.Original_Text: 자네 덕분에 통행로의 안전이 어느정도 확보되었구만. 하하. 고맙네.
20030441.English_Text: Thanks to you, the passageway is somewhat safe. Haha. Thank you.

20030443.Original_Text: 별 일이 아니긴. 자 여기 내가 준비한 물건일세.

20030443.Chinese_Text: 별 일이 아니긴. 자 여기 내가 준비한 물건일세.

20030445.Original_Text: 다음에 또 부탁할 일이 있으면 자네를 찾겠네!

20030445.Chinese_Text: 다음에 또 부탁할 일이 있으면 자네를 찾겠네!

20030448.Original_Text: 우리는 약초를 캐러왔다냥. 그런데 주변에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>무서운 친구들</>이 너무 많다냥. 우리 약초꾼들을 조금만 도와달라냥.
20030448.English_Text: We're here to dig up herbs. But there are too many <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scary friends</> around. Help our herbalists a little.
20030448.Chinese_Text: 우리는 약초를 캐러왔다냥. 그런데 주변에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>무서운 친구들</>이 너무 많다냥. 우리 약초꾼들을 조금만 도와달라냥.

20030451.Original_Text: 마침 잘 만났다냥! 그 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>재수 없는 은발 머리</>는 어디 갔냥?
20030451.English_Text: Looks like we met! Where did that <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>unlucky silver hair</> go?
20030451.Chinese_Text: 마침 잘 만났다냥! 그 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>재수 없는 은발 머리</>는 어디 갔냥?

20030452.English_Text: (They say they've been away for a while)

20030453.Original_Text: 흥. 그래도 말이 통하는 인간이 와서 다행이다냥.

20030453.Chinese_Text: 흥. 그래도 말이 통하는 인간이 와서 다행이다냥.

20030455.Original_Text: 앗. 어떻게 알았냥!? 여기 어딘가에 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>개다래풀</>이 있다고 한다냥. 그것 좀 구해달라냥. 이렇게 부탁한다냥.
20030455.English_Text: Ah. How did you know!? It's like there's a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Gaestrogenus</> somewhere here. I want you to get it. I'm begging you like this.
20030455.Chinese_Text: 앗. 어떻게 알았냥!? 여기 어딘가에 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>개다래풀</>이 있다고 한다냥. 그것 좀 구해달라냥. 이렇게 부탁한다냥.

20030459.English_Text: Why do you like that <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>grass</> so much?

20030466.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</>의 자연이 절경이고 장관이라해서 왔는데, 이게 무슨 일인지 모르겠소!
20030466.English_Text: I came here because the nature of the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sea Moon Continent</> is superb and spectacular, but I don't know what this is!
20030466.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</>의 자연이 절경이고 장관이라해서 왔는데, 이게 무슨 일인지 모르겠소!

20030468.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>투엽단</> 놈들을 걱정했건만, 웬 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>부패한 수양 무리</>가 밀렵을 시작했소. 이를 어쩐단 말이오! 소협의 도움이 필요하오.
20030468.English_Text: I was worried about the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Fighters</>, but some <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Corrupt Sheep</> were poached. I've started.
20030468.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>투엽단</> 놈들을 걱정했건만, 웬 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>부패한 수양 무리</>가 밀렵을 시작했소. 이를 어쩐단 말이오! 소협의 도움이 필요하오.

20030471.Original_Text: 오, 수고했소. 덕분에 마음이 조금은 놓이는구려.
20030471.English_Text: Oh, you did a good job. I hope this puts my mind at ease a bit.
20030471.Chinese_Text: 오, 수고했소. 덕분에 마음이 조금은 놓이는구려.

20030473.Original_Text: 뿌리 뽑진 못하겠지만, 우선 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양 대장</>에게 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>회수한 밀렵품</>을 전달해보겠소. 그럼 다음에 또 뵙겠소.
20030473.English_Text: It won't be rooted out, but first, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Farm Captain</> <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Recovered poach</> I'll pass it on to you. See you next time.
20030473.Chinese_Text: 뿌리 뽑진 못하겠지만, 우선 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양 대장</>에게 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>회수한 밀렵품</>을 전달해보겠소. 그럼 다음에 또 뵙겠소.

20030475.Original_Text: 오, 여기서 또 만나는 군! 여긴 어쩐 일이야?
20030475.English_Text: Oh, see you here again! What's going on here?
20030475.Chinese_Text: 오, 여기서 또 만나는 군! 여긴 어쩐 일이야?

20030477.Original_Text: 그렇군. 나는 우리, 아, 아니, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>달빛바람</> 문주님이 보내서 왔어.
20030477.English_Text: That's right. I'm from our, ah, no, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Moonlight</> Lord Moon.
20030477.Chinese_Text: 그렇군. 나는 우리, 아, 아니, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>달빛바람</> 문주님이 보내서 왔어.

20030478.Original_Text: 그래서 말인데 나 좀 도와줄 수 있어? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>달빛바람</>이 요구한 일정이 너무 빠듯해서 말이야...
20030478.English_Text: So, can you help me? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Moonlight</>The schedule requested by <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Moonlight</> is too tight...
20030478.Chinese_Text: 그래서 말인데 나 좀 도와줄 수 있어? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>달빛바람</>이 요구한 일정이 너무 빠듯해서 말이야...

20030480.Original_Text: 오 고맙군. 그럼 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>낙원족이 사용하는 물건</>들 좀 구해줘. 그들이 물건도 연구 가치가 있다나...
20030480.English_Text: Oh thank you. So get me some <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Paradise-use objects</>. They're also worth researching...
20030480.Chinese_Text: 오 고맙군. 그럼 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>낙원족이 사용하는 물건</>들 좀 구해줘. 그들이 물건도 연구 가치가 있다나...

20030482.Original_Text: 아니긴 뭐가 아니야. 이번엔 좀 직접 하라니까.
